messages.message: This is my first time seeing the "modified" filter in Google Drive and I wonder if we could build something similar to our search feature. I think this would be useful for helping filter out outdated information from the customers' data sources. For example, when I ask for the performance review timeline for 2024, it uses info from a doc created in 2022.
When I ask for health coverage in 2023, we did a great job filter out the doc for health coverage in 2024!

Perf review search (https://aihub.instabase.com/search/0191ec73-29ef-79f8-9f3d-8401a1a620e4). I asked for 2024, but it pulled a doc that was modified in 2022. The document doesn't specify the that the doc only applies to year 2022.
that would be a great feature, big plus 1!
